long_description: The Anon Raider snow helmet offers skate-inspired, low-profile protection for riding anywhere on the mountain. Passive ventilation channels are integrated into the helmet and draw fresh air in the front and pull moisture out the back. Goggles ventilation channels help keep goggles from fogging. Endura-Shell construction features an injection-molded ABS exterior for long-lasting durability and ding-resistant strength. Classic fleece lines the interior and ear pads for excellent insulation. Simple Fit allows riders to rock a beanie underneath their lid by simply removing the ear pads and inner liner for a skate-inspired, low-profile fit and feel. Removable clip on the back of the Anon Raider helmet secures goggles strap. Anon helmets are optimized for use with Anon goggles, offering an airtight, seamless connection between helmet and goggles (goggles not included). Compatible with Anon ASFX helmet audio system (sold separately) for flawless audio integration on the mountain. This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077B alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
